publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3160 Malcolm Chisholm: Implementing the Cancer Strategy-That the Parliament acknowledges the problems highlighted by the recent Clinical Standards Board for Scotland reports on cancer services; welcomes the Cancer Strategy and the significant and dedicated resources that have been allocated for its implementation; supports the key role of front-line staff in deciding investment priorities and leading service change, and looks forward to sustained progress in implementing the strategy and reaching all the Clinical Standards Board for Scotland standards. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*
